resources.string: Welcome to the Dwayne Johnson Quiz!\n
Here your knowledge about the world famous athlete/entertainer/actor will be tested. Please answer the following 5 questions.
2. Which of these scenes is from the movie WALKING TALL?
3. What nickname(s)/stage name(s) is/are Dwayne Johnson known for?
The Most Electrifying Man In All Of Entertainment
The Hardest Working Man On The Planet
4. What movie did Dwayne most recently star in with Kevin Hart?
5. How many movies in the Fast And Furious franchise did Dwayne star in as Luke Hobbs?
